    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActionTimerActivity, ArmoryActivity

    public abstract class AttributesActivity
extends androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity
    Abstract class we implement for woodchopping, fishing, and combat. All three of these activities are extremely similar, with the main difference being the action that gets performed

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void onCreate(android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)
      Initialize the objects and TextViews required for this page, including stamina computations
      protected void onDestroy()
      Write the local User and any updates made to it back to the DB; this is called when we press the back button to return to the Main Activity
      private void readUser()
      Read in User by userID, update all the textViews at top of page, and flags that the User has been loaded in
      protected void refreshUserAttributes()
      Refreshes the TextViews that display the User attributes at the top of the page
      protected abstract void settingContentView()
      Sets the correct content view for the abstract class implementing, called in onCreate()
